products.title: Fusion Citrine Roman Blind
products.description: We say theres no better way to inject some colour into your home than with a drop of yellow. The fusion citrine is an absolute delight to have in their harlequin additions collection. And this citrine shade is one that adds enough joy to your dcor, whilst still being a colour we say theres no better way to inject some colour into your home than with a drop of yellow.

products.title: Tango Citrine
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1340mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 100% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro. Buy made to measure tango citrine deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds.
